email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts and if you’d like to proceed. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is quite low given current market conditions. However, I can offer a revised rate of $48.00 per metric ton. The laycan for MV Ocean Star is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.00 is more reasonable. We can agree to this rate provided the laycan remains firm. Also, could you confirm the demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.00 works for you. The laycan is confirmed for October 15-20. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Please let me know if you need any further details or if we can proceed to finalize the charter party. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the charter party at $48.00 per metric ton, with the laycan of October 15-20 and demurrage at $20,000 per day. Please send over the contract for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll have the contract drafted and sent over to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation and looking forward to a successful shipment. Best regards, Sarah
